sentence.text: In this study, we applied this strategy to identify novel gene interactions in positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-mutant cancer cells.

Silencing of transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway or endodermal cell differentiation recapitulated the synthetic lethal effects of miR-1298 expression in positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-driven cancer cells, whereas coexpression of both proteins was critical to rescue miR-1298-induced cell death.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: In clinical specimens, elevated endodermal cell differentiation expression correlated with poorer survival in lung cancer patients with an oncogenic positive regulation of protein phosphorylation gene signature, suggesting a novel candidate biomarker in this disease setting.
Our results define a novel regulatory pathway in positive regulation of protein phosphorylation-driven cancers, which offers a potential therapeutic target for their eradication.
